General.Name: Shenzhen United Winners Laser Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen United Winners Laser Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells laser welding equipment in China and internationally. The company lasers and welding machines; intelligent manufacturing equipment for new energy batteries, automobiles, consumer electronics batteries, relays, sensors, and hydrogen fuel cells; welding equipment for the optical communication industry; welding equipment for medical devices; laser soldering equipment; and laser plastic welding equipment. Its products are used in power batteries, automobile manufacturing, consumer electronics, hardware appliances, optical communications, medical equipment, plastic welding and soldering, and other fields. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Qiang  Xie
1.Title: CFO, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Deputy GM
